Uncontrollable Laughter is a disease symptom in DayZ that presents after consuming human meat. The disease is called Brain Damage.
It is a disease and the cause of Salmonella is eating uncooked or raw meat. The symptom is vomiting and the treatment is Charcoal Tablets.
Used to refill Gas Mask Filters and cure cure poisoning such as food poisoning or from drinking gasoline, alcoholic tincture, or disinfectant spray.
Used as an antibiotic to treat most diseases.
Used to reset your shock level. Best used when close to or already falling unconscious.
Used when you have low health to negate some of the negatives effects for a brief time.
Used to boost your immune system.

answer: Used to inject liquids into your body. To be used with a Blood Bag or Saline Bag.
Used to speed up natural blood recovery.
Used to treat pain from minor physical injuries.
Used to collect blood from yourself or another survivor which turns it into a Blood Bag for use later with an IV Starter Kit.
Used to replenish blood. Needs to be used with an IV Starter Kit.
